item.title: [sld] Mountain
item.description:
Basic Land — Mountain

({T}: Add {R}.)

item.title: [sld] Atraxa, Praetors' Voice
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Angel Horror

Flying, vigilance, deathtouch, lifelink

At the beginning of your end step, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [sld] Breya, Etherium Shaper
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Human

When Breya, Etherium Shaper enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

{2}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Choose one —

• Breya deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

• Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

• You gain 5 life.

item.title: [sld] Yidris, Maelstrom Wielder
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Ogre Wizard

Trample

Whenever Yidris, Maelstrom Wielder deals combat damage to a player, as you cast spells from your hand this turn, they gain cascade. (When you cast the spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

item.title: [sld] Glacial Fortress
item.description:
Land

Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.

{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

item.title: [sld] Rootbound Crag
item.description:
Land

Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.

{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

item.title: [sld] Drowned Catacomb
item.description:
Land

Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

item.title: [sld] Dragonskull Summit
item.description:
Land

Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

item.title: [sld] Sunpetal Grove
item.description:
Land

Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

item.title: [sld] Mother of Runes
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

{T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Death's Shadow
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

item.title: [sld] Forest
item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.title: [sld] Elvish Mystic
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: Add {G}.

item.title: [sld] Concordant Crossroads
item.description:
World Enchantment

All creatures have haste.

item.title: [sld] Nomad Outpost
item.description:
Land

Nomad Outpost enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.

item.title: [sld] Ghost Quarter
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}, Sacrifice Ghost Quarter: Destroy target land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Island
item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [sld] Sram, Senior Edificer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Advisor

Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Balthor the Defiled
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Zombie Dwarf

Minion creatures get +1/+1.

{B}{B}{B}, Exile Balthor the Defiled: Each player returns all black and all red creature cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [sld] Torbran, Thane of Red Fell
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Noble

If a red source you control would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals that much damage plus 2 instead.

item.title: [sld] Depala, Pilot Exemplar
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Pilot

Other Dwarves you control get +1/+1.

Each Vehicle you control gets +1/+1 as long as it's a creature.

Whenever Depala, Pilot Exemplar becomes tapped, you may pay {X}. If you do, reveal the top X cards of your library, put all Dwarf and Vehicle cards from among them into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [sld] Goblin Settler
item.description:
Creature — Goblin

When Goblin Settler enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

item.title: [sld] Collector Ouphe
item.description:
Creature — Ouphe

Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.

item.title: [sld] Vengevine
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Haste

Whenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return Vengevine from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [sld] Void Winnower
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi

Your opponents can't cast spells with even mana values. (Zero is even.)

Your opponents can't block with creatures with even mana values.

item.title: [afr] A-Dwarfhold Champion
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Warrior

Ward {1}

As long as Dwarfhold Champion is equipped, it gets +0/+2.

item.title: [afr] A-Armory Veteran
item.description:
Creature — Orc Warrior

Ward — Pay 2 life.

As long as Armory Veteran is equipped, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [afr] A-Bruenor Battlehammer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Warrior

Each creature you control gets +2/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.

{1}: Attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.

item.title: [znr] A-Kargan Intimidator
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Cowards can't block Warriors.

{1}: Choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn —

• Kargan Intimidator gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

• Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn.

item.title: [znr] A-Goma Fada Vanguard
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever Goma Fada Vanguard attacks, target creature an opponent controls with power less than or equal to the number of Warriors and Equipment you control can't block this turn.

item.title: [znr] A-Kargan Warleader
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Ward {1}

Other Warriors you control get +1/+1 and have ward {1}.

item.title: [afr] A-Plate Armor
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +3/+3 and has ward {1}. (Whenever equipped creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)

Equip {3}. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each other Equipment you control.

item.title: [znr] A-Nahiri, Heir of the Ancients
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Nahiri

+1: Create a 1/1 white Kor Warrior creature token. You may attach an Equipment you control to it.

−2: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a Warrior and Equipment card from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

−3: Nahiri, Heir of the Ancients deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to twice the number of Warriors and Equipment you control.

item.title: [khm] A-Tyvar Kell
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Tyvar

Elves you control have "{T}: Add {B}."

+1: Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target Elf. Untap it. It gains deathtouch until end of turn.

0: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

−7: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast an Elf spell, it gains haste until end of turn and you draw two cards."

item.title: [khm] A-Harald Unites the Elves
item.description:
Enchantment — Saga

(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I — Mill five cards. You may put an Elf or Tyvar card from your graveyard onto the battlefield.

II — Put a +1/+1 counter on each Elf you control.

III — Whenever an Elf you control attacks this turn, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

item.title: [khm] A-Elderfang Ritualist
item.description:
Creature — Elf Cleric

When Elderfang Ritualist dies, you may exile it. If you do, return another target Elf or Tyvar card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [khm] A-Skemfar Avenger
item.description:
Creature — Elf Berserker

Whenever another Elf or Berserker you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

item.title: [khm] A-Canopy Tactician
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Other Elves you control get +1/+1.

{T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.

item.title: [khm] A-Return Upon the Tide
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's an Elf, create three 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens.

Foretell {3}{B}

item.title: [khm] A-Harald, King of Skemfar
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Warrior

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

When Harald, King of Skemfar enters the battlefield, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may reveal an Elf, Warrior, or Tyvar card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [khm] A-Thornmantle Striker
item.description:
Creature — Elf Rogue

When Thornmantle Striker enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Remove X counters from target permanent, where X is the number of Elves you control.

• Target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves you control.

item.title: [khm] A-Skemfar Elderhall
item.description:
Land

Skemfar Elderhall enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G}.

{1}{B}{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Skemfar Elderhall: Up to one target creature you don't control gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Create two 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [khm] A-Elven Bow
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

When Elven Bow enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token, then attach Elven Bow to it.

Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and has reach.

Equip {3}

item.title: [khm] A-Elderleaf Mentor
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

When Elderleaf Mentor enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

item.title: [khm] A-Shessra, Death's Whisper
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Elf Warlock

Bewitching Whispers — When Shessra, Death's Whisper enters the battlefield, target creature blocks this turn if able.

Whispers of the Grave — At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [stx] A-Symmetry Sage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Flying

Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, target creature you control has base power 3 until end of turn.

item.title: [stx] A-Spell Satchel
item.description:
Artifact

Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a book counter on Spell Satchel.

{T}, Remove a book counter from Spell Satchel: Add {C}.

{2}, {T}, Remove two book counters from Spell Satchel: Draw a card.

item.title: [jmp] A-Blood Artist
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [znr] A-Base Camp
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard spell or to activate an ability of a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard.

item.title: [snc] Brokers Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.

• Destroy target enchantment.

• Draw two cards.
